v8:item.v8:content: Compliance with legislation of the Russian Federation

Показывает соответствие федеральному закону Российской Федерации от 6 апреля 2011 г. N 63-ФЗ "Об электронной подписи". Рекомендуется использовать квалифицированные сертификаты ключа подписи (КСКП) по 63-ФЗ.

Shows whether it corresponds to the Federal Law of the Russian Federation as of April 6, 2011 No.63-FZ "On digital signature". It is recommended that you use qualified certificates of signature key (SKQS) according to 63-FZ.

Shows whether it corresponds to the Federal Law of the Russian Federation as of April 6, 2011 No.63-FZ "On digital signature". It is recommended that you use qualified certificates of signature key (SKQS) according to 63-FZ.

Показывает установлен ли сертификат в личный список (личное хранилище) на компьютере. Для подписания и расшифровки требуется, чтобы сертификат был установлен в личный список на компьютере и был связан с закрытым ключом.

Shows whether certificate is installed to the private list (personal storage) on computer. For signature and decryption it is required to install certificate to the private list on computer and connect it to the private key.

Shows whether certificate is installed to the private list (personal storage) on computer. For signature and decryption it is required to install certificate to the private list on computer and connect it to the private key.

Shows whether certificate is installed to the private list (personal storage) on computer. For signature and decryption it is required to install certificate to the private list on computer and connect it to the private key.

Shows whether certificate is installed to the private list (personal storage) on computer. For signature and decryption it is required to install certificate to the private list on computer and connect it to the private key.

Shows whether certificate is installed to the private list (personal storage) on computer. For signature and decryption it is required to install certificate to the private list on computer and connect it to the private key.

Shows whether certificate is installed to the private list (personal storage) on computer. For signature and decryption it is required to install certificate to the private list on computer and connect it to the private key.

Показывает результат проверки данных сертификата с помощью программы электронной подписи и шифрования.
Данные сертификата, загруженные из файла сертификата или другим путем, могут быть некорректны по разным причинам, но самые частые следующие: - закончился срок действия сертификата; - сертификат в списке отозванных.

Shows the result of certificate data check using the application of digital signature and encryption.
Certificate data imported from certificate file or using another method may be incorrect due to several reasons. These are the most frequent ones: - certificate has expired; - certificate is in the revoked certificates list.

Shows the result of certificate data check using the application of digital signature and encryption.

Показывает имеется ли на компьютере программа, указанная в сертификате для закрытого ключа, которая позволяет подписывать и расшифровывать данные.
Shows whether there is the application on computer specified in the certificate for the private key. The application allows you to sign and decrypt data.
Shows whether there is the application on computer specified in the certificate for the private key. The application allows you to sign and decrypt data.
Shows whether there is the application on computer specified in the certificate for the private key. The application allows you to sign and decrypt data.

Показывает возможность подписания данных закрытым ключом сертификата с помощью программы электронной подписи и шифрования. Требуется пароль.
Shows whether it is possible to sign data with the certificate private key using the application of digital signature and encryption. Password required.
Shows whether it is possible to sign data with the certificate private key using the application of digital signature and encryption. Password required.

Shows whether data can be encrypted with the certificate public key using the digital signature and encryption application.

Запомнить пароль сертификата до закрытия программы. При снятии флажка пароль стирается из памяти, если запоминался ранее.
Remember certificate password before closing the application. When the check box is cleared, the password is erased from memory if it was remembered earlier.

Пароль запрашивает программа электронной подписи, а не программа 1С:Предприятие, так как для выбранного сертификата указана усиленная защита закрытого ключа.
Password is requested by the digital signature application, not by 1C:Enterprise as strong private key protection is specified for the selected certificate.
